member.name: T:System.Web.Optimization.React.BabelBundle
member.summary: Represents a bundle that compiles JavaScript via Babel before minifying.

member.param: The virtual path used to reference the from within a view or Web page.

member.summary: Gets the transformations that should be used by the bundle.

member.name: T:System.Web.Optimization.React.BabelTransform
member.summary: Transforms JavaScript via Babel. Should be included before any minification transformations.
